amendatorysection.para: Sections 25-12,101 to 25-12,107 shall be so interpreted and construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law of those states which enact them.

annotation.para: Operation of act is not dependent upon reciprocal law in another state. Abramson v. Abramson, 161 Neb. 782, 74 N.W.2d 919 (1956).
